                         int curLine,
                         int currentID,
                         int prevID)
        Adds a line to the scenario.
        Parameters:
        element - The string to append in valid HTML format.
        curLine - The new value for the currentLine.
        currentID - The ID for the new line being appended.
        prevID - The ID of the line directly before the new line.
